article_title: Why the Uber of healthcare is here to stay
article_text:

twitter.description: As the annual JP Morgan Healthcare conference kicks off next week, hundreds of hedge funds, private equity firms and VCs will be making their annual pilgrimage to San Francisco’s Union Square to ...
twitter.title: Why the Uber of healthcare is here to stay

article_metadata.keywords: uber, jp morgan healthcare conference, affordable care act, one medical, pager, doctor on demand
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Affordable Care Act, Commentary, JP Morgan Healthcare Conference, Uber
article_metadata.description: The growing sophistication of the Internet has spawned the proliferation of startups that could forever change the business of healthcare and create a market for on-demand care, say Eric Kim and Chi-Hua Chien, co-founders of Goodwater Capital.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Why the Uber of healthcare is here to stay
